pr_title: docs: update docs around column aliasing

timeline.message:
docs: update docs around column aliasing

System generated column aliases are now guaranteed to be unique.

timeline.bodyText:
I've changed this from:

Push queries enable you to query a materialized view

As that would suggest you can only perform push queries on MVs.... which will suggest tables to most users, while ksqlDB supports push queries on streams too.
